question: Drug Test Help?(THC)?
question_content: ok so in 3 days i am getting drug tested.(pee cup). i am not going to smoke anymore for you weed haters out there it was a one time thing and thats why i want it out of my system. What can i drink or put in my drug test so i can get the thc out of my system so i can pass the test?

answers.answer_content:
-drink ton's of water,
-niacin
-ready clean.
or just drink a s-h-i-i-i-t-t ton of monster, because it does have niacin in it!

Go to your nearest GNC store and buy a product called Strip natural cleanser. There are other name brand products that do the same but I recomend strip because the people at the gnc recommended strip to me. I was straight up and said I need to pass a drug test. It's not cheap but it's GUARANTEED. It will cost you about 50 bucks. Also if you know any Haitians, ask them about asoci (pernounced: As-so-see) it's a natural vine that grows alot down here in south Florida, it's even right in my backyard. Grab some asoci, boil it and drink the tea everyday. You only have 3 days so you would need to chug a half gallon to a gallon a day. Worst part: it taste nasty! If you don't live down south then scratch that go the gnc store and buy a strip. See if they sell home drug test so you can check if it's working before you take the test.  Take an hour or two before you take the actual test. Wait too long it'll ware off.

right before you go to take the drug test you need to go buy a small box of sure jell that you make jello with poor it in a glass of warm water and drink it like 15 min before you go and don't pee till you get their
